title: Modern Physics
description: Topics in quantum physics including the Schrodinger equation; angular momentum and spin; the Pauli exclusion principle; and quantum statistics. Applications in multi-electron atoms and molecules, and in solid-state, nuclear, and particle physics.

pre_req_data.text: Prerequisite(s): PHYS 5A, PHYS 5L, PHYS 5B, PHYS 5M, PHYS 5C, PHYS 5N and PHYS 5D; or PHYS 6A, PHYS 6L, PHYS 6B, PHYS 6M, PHYS 6C, PHYS 6N, and PHYS 5D; or equivalent.
courses: PHYS 5A PHYS 5L PHYS 5B PHYS 5M PHYS 5C PHYS 5N
PHYS 6A PHYS 6L PHYS 6B PHYS 6M PHYS 6C PHYS 6N
